name: Pachansky Mathematics 2+2=8
description: You play as an boy next door from the district that wants to enter the university, and you need to solve various problems and examples.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP\Vista\7\8\10 Processor: 1.2GHz processor Memory: 228 MB RAM Graphics: 256 MB Storage: 100 MB available space Additional Notes: minimum 1280x720 screen resolution
